warezcdn.title: Haruchika: Haruta to Chika wa seishun suru

imdb.title: Haruchika: Haruta to Chika wa seishun suru
imdb.plot: It's Chika's first day of high school, and she's so excited to start a brand new life! Her goal is to become her image of a "cute girl". She plans to quit volleyball and start playing the flute, because it's more pretty and femini...

episodes.title: Melodious Cipher
episodes.plot: Chika Homura,who has lot of interest in playing flute and to participate in Brass Comepetition enters High School.There she meets her childhood friend Haruta Kamijo who is smart and belongs to music club and plays French Horn.Together they encounter a mysterious writing on musical note board written in cipher.

episodes.title: Cloth Cube
episodes.plot: Haruta and Chika wants second year student Miyoko Narushima who plays Oboe, to join their club.But Miyoko has dark past where her puzzle loving brother died of cancer.He left her a Rubik's cube which was left unsolved by Miyoko.

episodes.title: Exit Game
episodes.plot: Maren Sei,a Chinese guy adopted by American family has to deal with his issue.He used to play Sax but left it and joined drama club though he didn't know how to act.Both Music Club and Drama Club compete in a drama named Exit Game.

episodes.title: Venacular Modernism
episodes.plot: Haruta has to vacant his apartment due to rent problems.With help from his sister and Chika he finds an apartment which is reported to be haunted.How did Haruta solve this problem???

episodes.title: Elephant's Breath
episodes.plot: Akari Goto,a girl from another school trespasses into High school to meet Haruta to solve a mystery about a color named Elephant's Breath.

episodes.title: Springraphy
episodes.plot: A mysterious girl is entering Music room when no one is there.She is Seizawa who happens to be a spring student who recently became deaf.

episodes.title: The Frequency Is 77.4MHz
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: First Love Sommelier
episodes.plot: Naoko volunteers to help Chika rehearse for the upcoming qualifying round, but wants her help in return. Her aunt has returned to Japan in search of information on her first love and goes to the school's First Love Sommelier for assistance.

episodes.title: The Gaze of Asmodeus
episodes.plot: Mr. Kusakabe has collapsed from exhuastion! To help out Mr. Kusakabe, Chika and Haruta investigate the mystery behind the Fujigasaki High School brass band club advisor's suspension and the peeping Tom known as Asmodeus.

episodes.title: The Jaberwock's Licence
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Valley of Eden
episodes.plot: According to the will of Mr. Kusakabe's former teacher, his granddaughter, Makoto, is the only one who knows the whereabouts of the key to his beloved piano. Can they figure out the secret of the key's location?

episodes.title: Sympathy Triangle
episodes.plot: Mr. Kusakabe got an offer to conduct for the Hamamatsu Orchestra. Will he leave the Shimizu South High School Brass Band Club? Why did he skip on the performance as a conductor years before? Haruta and Chika follow him to find out.
